reviews.review: Savagely brave for such a formula.
Just can't get better than this! ??

This is the end game, like you actually feel it itâ€™s not like Hela or Ultron where they die that same movie, no this is the final game. Stakes are at the highest, there are major casualties, and you feel a sense of hopelessness, Thanos is the new Darth Vader of this generation.
Saw it twice, going again tomorrow to see it a third time.

I saw this movie the night before it came out with all the die hards.  Everyone in the movie theater was audibly disapointed.  Everyone i have talked to (in multiple states) have literally hated this movie, so I'm perplexed by all the 5 star reviews.  Kids are literally crying since this movie was so depressing.  It's obviously a part one of part two so just keep in mind you are seeing ony half of the movie.  I've written this review several times and it hasn't been posted yet, so maybe bad reviews are being filtered.

After 10 years, Infinity war is here and it does not disappoint. Thanos has been teased time and time again, the MCU brings the mad titan to life in the most conveying way. He is up there with Loki and Killmonger. So many characters, and it makes it so enjoyable the way everyone interacts with eachother, go see this movie, then go see it again, and again.... and again!

Loved the movie a lot, it's been leading to this, 10 years of movies and the culmination of all those movies. Really emotional, funny at some parts, EPIC, and surprisingly dark at most parts but overall loved the movie lives up to all the hype
With many unexpected plot twists, Infinity War kept me on the edge of my seat. Despite having so many characters, the plot was rarely confusing and was handled well.

Avengers infinity war was awesome, the way they pulled all of it in without it going too fast. The way they had used untied ropes to reveal the soul stones location in a way no one expected. The plot was believable, I understood what Thanos wanted(even though I didn't agree with his ways), and the emotional effects of the movie hit me hard because I have loved this seris ever since it started on may 2nd 2008. Also I wish the kept the release date of may 4th because that's the day the first avengers moivie came out.
